message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations and deliver substantial returns on your investment.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price that works for both of us. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate you taking the time to consider my initial offer and providing your perspective on the product's value.  While I understand your position, $950,000 falls short of what I consider a fair reflection of its true worth. To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000. This price acknowledges your interest while ensuring a reasonable return on a unique product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $1,100,000 for the product.
